nodes.text: The Hyabb-Twith Corridor was an ancient hyperspace trade route that was located on the spinward arc of the Galactic Core. The route connected the planets Hyabb and Twith, passing through Voon in the process.

In the decades prior to the Old Sith Wars this route was in contended territory, and there was a constant threat attacks from the warring factions. This situation was made worse when the Nelori Marauders decide to begin raiding ships along the route, this continued until the Jedi were called in to diffuse the situation.
